content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron plate factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Inserter (position unknown) that puts into the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft an Iron Gear Wheel, you need 2 iron plates.

### Errors when extracting from furnaces
- Make sure to check the furnace inventory before extracting items to ensure it contains the items you wish to extract.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
